security: Redaction of Social Security numbers due to privacy concerns. "The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest."
summary: This document contains personnel records for Jan Richard Schlichtmann, including payroll authorizations, leave records, and a memo certifying no relation to members of Congress, during his employment with the HSCA.
summary_one_paragraph: The document is a collection of personnel forms and memos related to Jan Richard Schlichtmann's employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) in 1977-1978. It includes payroll authorization forms for his appointment and termination, a personal leave record, and a memorandum certifying that he is not related to any current member of Congress, alongside an internal memo from G. Robert Blakey informing of Schlichtmann's hiring.
title: Staff Payroll Records
